text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
choice_data_list: Are you okay with that nosebleed...?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry... It doesn't look like it'll stop anytime soon...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: When I psyched myself up to do my best, it was like, 'Eiy, eiy, bubaa~'...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I haven't bumped into anything today, so why the nosebleed...?
Perhaps the fatigue has built up from running consecutive races. It might be necessary to review future plans.
